Introduction

Cosmic Girls Φορεύς (Dream Carrier) is a sub-unit of the South Korean girl group WJSN (also known as Cosmic Girls). Formed by Starship Entertainment in 2018, this sub-unit comprises three members: Yeoreum, Dayoung, and Yeonjung. Their unique role is to collect dreams from another world. As first-year students at the WJSN School of Wizardry, they specialize in dream collection and world observation. Described as curious, vivacious, and joyful, they bring a touch of magic to their musical endeavors within WJSN.
